short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With just one click, take a screenshot of the current Coursera video frame and copy it directly to your clipboard!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a Coursera learner who struggles to quickly capture screenshots of the professor's current slide?

With Course Capture, you can save what's on the video screen with just one click! It copies the current slide directly to your clipboard, so you can easily paste it wherever you needâ€”no more print screens, snipping tools, or cropping required.
